name: Las Aventuras De Ikal
description:
Las Aventuras de Ikal is a prototype 3D puzzle platformer designed in Unity for the Unidos Game Jam for Hispanic Heritage month. Inspired by the various cultures of the team members, the game combines the scenery of the volcano Momotombo in Nicaragua as well as alebrijes from Mexican folklore. 

A young man has lost a precious item, stolen from him by a mischievous bird. He must now climb to the top of the volcano, solving various puzzles along the way alongside his alebrije friend Ikal in the spirit world. They will work together to achieve their goals and reach the sky.

Instructions

  • WASD keys for movement
  • R to interact
  • Right click to direct camera Y-axis
  • Left click to direct camera X-axis
  • Shift to run
  • Tab key to change between worlds

Credits

  • Alexsis - Design
  • Rafa - Programming
  • Andres- Programming
  • Elizabeth - Art
  • Suem - Art
  • Ayrton - Music
